channel.title: AI on Matthew Krueger
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Matthew Krueger

item.title: Introduction to Rust as an AI Tool
item.description:
# First post

Hello all, I’m Matthew Krueger, a student at BGSU studying computer science. I’m attempting to learn how to use HUGO to build my website, and this is my first post to the site. I’m always excited to learn. On this website, I plan to make portfolio posts, as well as host an online copy of my resume.

I’m also dyslexic, so please keep that in mind if you see any spelling mistakes.

Thanks! fasdf

Photo by xAI via Grok
